mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_IMAGE ( IMG_NO, ORIGIN_IMG_NAME, CHANGE_IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH, IMG_LEVEL, IMG_POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL, #{originImgName}, #{changeImgName}, #{imgPath}, #{imgLevel}, SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL, 2 )

INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, UNIT_NAME, DELIVERY_PRICE, PRODUCT_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent}, #{productQuantity}, #{unitName}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{productType} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNO, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.IMG_LEVEL = 1 AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_DATE DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNo, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.PRODUCT_QUANTITY productQuantity, p.UNIT_NAME unitName, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT productContent, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO AND p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNo, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.PRODUCT_QUANTITY productQuantity, p.UNIT_NAME unitName, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT productContent, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO AND p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
